description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. War In Box is a war shooting game on a virtual world of 100 km square. The stage is a virtual space, but real countries and World War II weapons appear there. You select the weapon (aircraft, tank, or ship) and your own country from four countries (U.S.A, England, Germany, or Japan) and fight the enemy country controlled by the computer. You will win when you destroyed all enemy bases or weapons.
description.short: War In Box is a war shooting game on a virtual world of 100 km square. The stage is a virtual space, but real countries and World War II weapons appear there.
